entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon then snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
